alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:30PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Malheur County through 200 PM PDT... At 130 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over High Peak, or 9 miles north of McDermitt, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jackson Summit around 150 PM PDT. Mendi Suri around 200 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
